item.title: fix(bug 58909)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58909) - Add a cloneSheet() which directly sets the sheetname to allow to avoid a costly renaming of sheets

item.title: fix(bug 59132)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59132) - Adjust implementation of COUNTBLANK to be conforming to Excel, empty strings are counted as blank as well

item.title: fix(bug 59199)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59199) - Gracefully handle null-values in Cell.setValue() for Date and Calendar similar to String.

item.title: fix(bug 59224)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59224) - XSSF: fix XSSFColor.hasTint which incorrectly used the alpha channel, add XSSFColor.hasAlpha

item.title: fix(bug 59222)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59222) - XSSF: fix NPE raised by XSSFSheet.getCellComments()

item.title: fix(bug 59212)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59212) - Common SS: copy non-validating XSSFSheet.addMergedRegionUnsafe from bug 58885 to Sheet interface

item.title: fix(bug 59208)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59208) - XWPF: bold xml value of "1" treated as false

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - HSLF: Add support for system colors

item.title: fix(bug 56930)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56930) - Add Workbook.getNames() to allow to query for names that appear multiple times

item.title: fix(bug 55791)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 55791) - Avoid using an existing file-name when creating a new slide, it could still be left over from previous partial removal

item.title: fix(bug 55668)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 55668) - Try to avoid NullPointerException by setting the cell to BLANK instead, when changing cell-type and a formula leads to null-string

item.title: fix(bug 59135)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59135) - Password gets truncated when using passwords longer than 15 characters for the function protectSheet()

item.title: add(bug 56549)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 56549) - Correctly calculate char index ranges for HWPF in the TextPieceTable

item.title: add(bug 57495)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57495) - Fix problem with tables in documents at pos 0

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - Fix a number of edge-cases where file-handles would be leaked

item.title: fix(bug 59170)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59170) - Remove deprecated classes (POI 3.15) - *Workbook.setRepeatingRowsAndColumns()

item.title: fix(bug 59170)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59170) - Remove deprecated classes (POI 3.15) - org.apache.poi.hssf/ss.util.Region

item.title: add(bug 57031)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57031) - Out of Memory when extracting text from attached files

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - More helpful exception when POIFSFileSystem is given a raw XML file

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - More helpful exceptions when OPCPackage is given OLE2 or ODF or raw XML files
